Edited July 19, 2015 by blacsky33
Nice blueprints!

Nice N1! Love it!

Does this mean he's here for a short stay, or he doesn't expect to be actively developing the mod for a long time? (kid graduates High school long time?)

About a month and a half. My paternal leave is then over so I have little choice to return to my work schedule. Even then, unfortunately I will have much less time to develop Tantares, so I am not so sure what is best to process.

Actually I still find a time on evenings, and in the middle of long sleepless nights (heh) to produce new parts - the ATV is done!

Also chiming in here. Work will resume on getting an update to your guys tomorrow. Just launched a High Altitude Balloon today. Much of the day will be spent looking for it. Thanks for being patient everyone. Great looking crafts.

Nice N1! Love it!

About a month and a half. My paternal leave is then over so I have little choice to return to my work schedule. Even then, unfortunately I will have much less time to develop Tantares, so I am not so sure what is best to process.

Actually I still find a time on evenings, and in the middle of long sleepless nights (heh) to produce new parts - the ATV is done!

No worries - Babies are life changing events and always come first before EVERYTHING else.

Nice N1! Love it!

About a month and a half. My paternal leave is then over so I have little choice to return to my work schedule. Even then, unfortunately I will have much less time to develop Tantares, so I am not so sure what is best to process.

Actually I still find a time on evenings, and in the middle of long sleepless nights (heh) to produce new parts - the ATV is done!

Congratulations on the little bun, and if there's anything I can do with helping to keep Tantares up and running, let me know! It's getting boring over here recovering from my surgery!

Regarding retextures, PPTS isn't the best for a CARV retexture because the capsule shapes are actually very different, unfortunately. Meanwhile, a nice Shenzou might be a good idea...

anyone else get the same errors ?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luna_16

Edited July 21, 2015 by blacsky33

Luna 16 was the sample return mission that crashed on the moon during its landing phase, right? I think Luna 21 was the one that finally brought samples back.

Fun Fact for those who don't know: Luna 16 attempted it's lunar descent and landing while the Apollo 11 crew was landed on the moon, a few hours after their EVA ended.

ATV/Capella progress update:

Unity import/export has finally begun. Noticed that the engine is missing an alpha channel specularity, so I'll have to work on that.

Ended up redoing the joints on the ATV solar array. I think this will be much better looking, but will be difficult to animate.

Is anyone interested in a ATV-specifc S-Band antenna? Easy, easy part to make and produce, but I also don't want to bloat the Tantares parts catalog.
WIP luna16&17(3pieces): https://www.dropbox.com/s/213rjnsiq1b19z2/wip.rar?dl=0

Yeah... I'll get right on that... (No, but seriously, a Salyut alt texture would be neat. Low priority though.

Wait, what? How do you know my name???

Because as far as I know, Beale had no plans for Buran parts, I'll be tackling that in my own add-on, though it won't be for a while. That's pretty much on hold for now while I tend to Tantares.

Yep. This is why I abandoned my own plans for making CBM's and a PMA. They're just really that good, and I didn't think I could do any better. Beale has thrown around the idea of converting the largely unused TKS docking ports into CBM's. I could actually use input on this. Does anyone use the TKS 1.25m Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 0.625m ports?

I've barely gotten to use the British rocket parts. They'll be staying 1.875m. I added TweakScale configs for them in the newest version of my TweakScale config, which you can get right here, as well as in my craft files post.

Tantares TweakScale config Alpha v1.1

ATV Solar panels have been largely modeled and textured. Input would be appreciated.

http://i.imgur.com/l8tjjVx.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/r0HaBqC.png

Next step will be animating in Unity. For the purposes of sharing my own experiences, I'll be documenting my procedure for Unity import, setting up the objects and their animations, and exporting to the game. Might help some of you get started in part creation. From one newb to another.
